function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of integrating strong and holistic ecosystem perspectives","category":"Environmental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about future vector dynamics and disease ecology","category":"Biodiversity and ecological impacts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of community-based studies for mitigating the effects of climate change on vbds","category":"Climate change effects","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited investigation of potential interactions between people and triatomine bugs in different landscape fragments","category":"Urbanization and habitat loss","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of climate change projections in describing the risk of multiple vector-borne effects","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Local ecological factors driving site-specific interventions may not be scalable and applicable in different regions, leading to ineffective disease control measures.","category":"Biodiversity and ecological impacts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of aedes aegypti breeding sites in water containers in dengue-endemic areas","category":"Environmental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of guppies around households","category":"Biodiversity and ecological impacts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in the range of local snail host due to changes in the marshland ecosystem and sociodemographic shifts","category":"Biodiversity and ecological impacts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to uv-c radiation from the surfacide system","category":"Air quality and pollution effects","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exposure to cuprous oxide as risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Tourism leading to negative environmental and social costs","category":"Pollution increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited representation of
